description:
Universal Basic Income -- can we get paid for being?

To end the culture of stress, loneliness and depression we need to look at what kind of lives we want to live. It is clear that the majority of people want to spend more time with friends and loved ones and less on working. Especially with job's that they hate. Current society promotes working as the ultimate goal of life. A universal basic income is a practical way of organising our economy to be more in line with what the vast majority wants; that wealth should be distributed more equal.
title: Olle Bjerkås & Martin Jordö: Universal Basic Income -- can we get paid for being?
